item.description:
OPEN MIC/Party with Free Live Music at PA's Lounge in Union Square, Somerville. Singers, musicians, horns, percussionists - everyone is welcome to attend the open mic in a relaxed atmosphere, to play or listen. Sax and horns encouraged. We plan to play this Wednesday, and will probably switch the day to Sunday late afternoon/early evening.

This is a continuation of the East Cambridge Galleria area open mic that went on hold ~ a month ago. It a blues style open mike for all types of music, but we are try to do at least 1 least a jazz set and some well known standards. There are at least 3 musician/singer meetup groups participating, and usually other social/meetups/groups. Songs on the songlist are: What a wonderful world, Over the rainbow, sunshine of my life, summertime, and good ideas would be songs like Sheâ€™s come Undun, Blue Skies, Take Five, improvisations on great jazz/blues riffs & themes. Even if you don't play, come to check it out and have a drink to support the effort!

Attention Party goers, Musicians & Singers!! Come join the party at the Wed Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge - Play or sing music solo or with backing band. All instruments and styles welcome. Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers. Bring your friends for the party, network, and meet interesting people.
item.name: RESTARTING OPEN MIC, Networking, Party in Union Square
